newpic.picDescription: Paul Mac & Daniel Johns on the cover of Rolling Stone Magazine.
Our two favorite musical minds caught in sepia.
Daniel Johns and wife Natalie Imbruglia
Daniel rocks out on stage.
Paul Mac poses for a press photo taken during the 'Panic Room' days.
Daniel rockin' out March 3rd 2006
Daniel and Ben captured in the moment during Silverchair's Great Escape performance.
Paul Mac & Daniel Johns take a quick break in the studio.
Paul Mac takes the stage with Silverchair. March 16th 2006
'Panic Room' press photo
Paul Mac gets captured in black and white.
Daniel spoils his dog Sweep.
...doing what they do best.
Paul Mac @ Melbourne World Aids Day Concert 2005
Who is that kissing Natalie Imbruglia?! Oh, it's Daniel Johns in a clown suit.
Daniel Johns spoils his crowd with a little help from his acoustic guitar.
Paul Mac mans all 88 keys while Silverchair rocks out for the crowd.
A candid close up Paul Mac on stage.
Paul Mac takes the stage with Australia's favorite trio.
Paul Mac covered in blue light from the Great Escape set.
Daniel pours his heart into the microphone during Silverchair's Great Escape set.
Daniel caught on stage amidst a cloud of dim light and smoke during a Silverchair set.
A rare shot of Daniel in his early days with a group of his mates.
Paul plays through the red hint of stage lights.
Daniel gives us a taste of his lyrical stylings.
Paul and Dan take the stage together.
Daniel makes sure his settings are set to 'ROCK' !
Paul Mac graces us with his talent.
Silverchair press photo from the Diorama Era.
Daniel sings for the crowd @ Great Escape.
Paul is right at home on stage behind his piano.
Silverchair @ Great Escape
Paul Mac poses for one of his Panic Room press photos.
Daniel and Paul show us how flexible thier musical talent really is.
Daniel fronts the microphone.
Daniel gets captured on film during a Neon Ballroom interview.
Paul Mac @ Melbourne World Aids Day Concert 2005
Daniel shows us how it is done.
The boys of Silverchair get lost in public jam session.
Paul Mac hides behind a haze of blue stage lighting.
Daniel hydrates with a quick swig of 'rock water'.
Daniel and Paul warming up.
Daniel plays for an anxious crowd.
Paul and Dan take the stage together @ The Great Escape concert.
Paul Mac is feeling the responsive energy of his crowd.
Paul Mac and Daniel Johns communicate through music.
Silverchair bassist Chris Joannou plays for the crowd.
Paul, Daniel, Chris and Ben take the stage at the Great Escape Concert.
Daniel plays on a darkened stage.
Silverchair rockin' out.
A Silverchair fan captures a still shot from the crowd's perspective.
Daniel sings his heart out.
Silverchair lighting up the stage with thier flawless dynamic.
A unique shot of a fan taking a picture of a fan taking a picture during Silverchair's Great Escape performance with Paul Mac.
Paul Mac handles the keyboards.
Silverchair rockin' out.
The guys of Silverchair rock thier way through a responsive crowd.
A soulful Johns strikes an emotional chord.
Daniel shakes things up @ Great Escape.
Daniel Johns leads Silverchair through a great set.
The boys are back at it...
Daniel strums for the camera.
Paul warms up his crowd.
Daniel Johns caters to his eager fans.
Daniel Johns lookin' good behind the mic.
Paul gets caught doing what he does best...
Daniel Johns plays during a Dissociative set.
Daniel in the early days of Silverchair.
Daniel sings for the crowd.
Daniel shows off his powerful vocal talents.
Paul lights up the stage with another impressive set.
Paul Mac knows what he is doing behind his keyboard.
An arial shot of Paul and Daniel during a dissociatives warm up.
Paul Mac proves confident during this set with one of his talented featured vocalists.
Paul Mac's genius is complimented by the vocals of ________________
Paul Mac shows us how to command a stage.
Daniel Johns with friend Luke Steele of The Sleepy Jackson.
Don't mess with Daniel.
Paul Mac warms up before a dissociatives gig.
